name: Space Adventure - Search for a Star 2017
name_original: Space Adventure - Search for a Star 2017
description:
Jump into a Space Adventure! Control your ship with WASD, rotate it with mouse and fire with Ctrl or left mouse button. Enemies will fire at you so you'll have to do some space maneuvers! Also watch out for asteroids - try not to collide with them - they might damage you ship. If it happens look out for hearts.

The game was made with assets from the Space Shooter tutorial on unity3d.com and images found on internet that were free to use.
